Cookiecutter React Django¶

Cookiecutter React Django is a framework for jumpstarting production-ready projects quickly.

Powered by Cookiecutter, Cookiecutter React Django combines the capabilities of Django as a backend service with the flexibility and ease of use of React into an opinionated framework that allows you to jumpstart a production-ready web application.

This project is based on a series of tutorials written by Craig Franklin called Creating an app with Docker Compose, Django, and Create React App
